features.title: The End of Manual Prospecting
features.aiSdr: AI Powered SDR That Qualifies Leads for You
features.aiSdrDescription: Deploy an AI agent that identifies ideal customers, engages them in human like conversations, and qualifies their interest so your team only talks to meeting ready leads.
features.whatsapp: Smart WhatsApp Follow ups, No Manual Messaging
features.whatsappDescription: Connect with prospects across any channel WhatsApp, LinkedIn, & Email. Our AI crafts and sends personalized follow ups at the perfect time, ensuring no opportunity is missed.
features.intelligence: Campaign Intelligence for Google and Meta
features.intelligenceDescription: Move beyond vanity metrics. Rarity analyzes your entire sales funnel, providing actionable insights to optimize campaigns, lower acquisition costs, and maximize your return.

solution.title: The Solution: AI Powered Prospecting, Human Results
solution.description: Rarity Leads automates and humanizes your entire lead generation process, so you can focus on closing deals, not chasing prospects. Our platform combines advanced AI, real time data, and multi channel outreach to deliver qualified leads, actionable insights, and scalable growth for agencies and sales teams.

whatsappConnection.question: How do I connect my WhatsApp account?
whatsappConnection.answer: Go to Dashboard > Outreach > WhatsApp > Accounts, click 'Add Account', and scan the QR code with your WhatsApp mobile app. Make sure your phone has an active internet connection.

qualifiedLeads.question: What's the difference between qualified and unqualified leads?
qualifiedLeads.answer: Qualified leads have shown genuine interest through engagement, meet your target criteria, and are ready for sales conversations. Unqualified leads need more nurturing or don't fit your ideal customer profile.

aiQualification.question: How does the AI lead qualification work?
aiQualification.answer: Our AI analyzes prospect behavior, engagement patterns, and responses to determine their buying intent and fit for your services. It uses machine learning to improve accuracy over time.

multipleWhatsapp.question: Can I use multiple WhatsApp accounts?
multipleWhatsapp.answer: Yes! You can connect multiple WhatsApp accounts for different campaigns or team members. Each account operates independently with its own conversations and analytics.

exportData.question: How do I export my lead data?
exportData.answer: Go to Dashboard > Leads, use the filters to select your data, then click the 'Export' button. You can export as CSV, Excel, or PDF formats.

supportedChannels.question: What channels do you support for outreach?
supportedChannels.answer: We currently support WhatsApp, Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, and X (Twitter). More channels are being added regularly based on user demand.

dataSecurity.question: How secure is my data?
dataSecurity.answer: We use enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption, SOC 2 compliance, and regular security audits. Your data is never shared with third parties without explicit consent.

messageTemplates.question: Can I customize message templates?
messageTemplates.answer: Absolutely! Create personalized templates with variables like {name}, {company}, and {custom_fields}. Save templates for different campaigns and use cases.

hero.title: We're Building the Future of
hero.subtitle: Rarity Leads was born from a simple frustration: why is lead generation still so manual, unpredictable, and expensive? We're changing that with AI that actually works.

problemSection.title: The Problem We're Solving
problemSection.description: Traditional lead generation is broken. Agencies waste countless hours on manual prospecting, only to end up with low-quality leads and unpredictable results. We're fixing this with intelligent automation that actually delivers qualified prospects.

timeWasted.title: 80% of your SDR's time is wasted
timeWasted.description: Research, cold calling, and manual follow-ups leave little time for actual selling.

poorQuality.title: Poor lead quality kills conversions
poorQuality.description: Most prospects aren't qualified, leading to wasted demos and sales calls.

inconsistentFollowup.title: Inconsistent follow-up loses deals
inconsistentFollowup.description: Manual processes mean prospects fall through the cracks and deals are lost.

scalingRequiresHeadcount.title: Scaling requires more headcount
scalingRequiresHeadcount.description: Growing your pipeline means hiring more SDRs, not improving efficiency.

aiQualification.title: AI-powered lead qualification
aiQualification.description: Our AI identifies and qualifies prospects before they reach your sales team, ensuring only interested leads get through.

multiChannelOutreach.title: Intelligent multi-channel outreach
multiChannelOutreach.description: Engage prospects across WhatsApp, LinkedIn, and email with personalized messages that actually get responses.

predictableGrowth.title: Predictable pipeline growth
predictableGrowth.description: Scale your lead generation without proportionally increasing headcount or costs.

humanHandoff.title: Human handoff at the right moment
humanHandoff.description: AI handles the grunt work, your team focuses on closing deals with qualified prospects.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we build and every decision we make.

aiFirst.title: AI-First Innovation
aiFirst.description: We believe in leveraging cutting-edge AI to solve real business problems, not just add complexity.

humanCentric.title: Human-Centric Results
humanCentric.description: Technology should enhance human relationships, not replace them. Our AI works alongside your team.

transparentROI.title: Transparent ROI
transparentROI.description: Every feature, every metric, every decision is designed to deliver measurable business impact.

continuousEvolution.title: Continuous Evolution
continuousEvolution.description: We're constantly learning from our users and improving our platform to stay ahead of the curve.

ctaSection.title: Ready to End Manual Prospecting?
ctaSection.description: Join agencies who've already automated their lead generation and are seeing predictable, scalable growth without the manual grind.
